page.description: Prompts the user for a filter
page.syntax: Filter_Expn as C = a5_get_filter(C default_filter [,C tables [,L use_genie [,L top_level [,C topparent_windowname [,C variable_list ]]]]])

argument.name: default_filter
argument.description: The default filter expression to display in the dialog.

argument.name: tables
argument.description:
Optional. Default = "". Controls whether external or local tables are shown.
"" = Show local tables.
Tables = List of tables to show.

argument.name: top_level
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .T.
.T. = Show top level tables of sets only.
.F. = Show all tables.

argument.name: topparent_windowname
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The name of the top parent window.

page.discussion: The A5_Get_Filter() function displays the Filter Builder and returns the specified filter expression.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example opens the Filter Builder with a default expression and returns the expression as modified by the user.
